name: Airplane Adventure
description: A child's first airplane trip with their favorite toy

pages.title: Adventure Morning
pages.story_text: Hero wakes up with Barvaz, their duck-shaped toy. 'Today we fly!' says Mom. Hero feels curious.
pages.illustration_prompt: Hero in pajamas holding Barvaz (a duck-shaped toy), standing in a bright bedroom with morning sunlight

pages.title: Packing Together
pages.story_text: Hero helps put clothes and Barvaz in the bag. 'Quack, I'm ready too!' Barvaz seems to say.
pages.illustration_prompt: Hero placing Barvaz (duck-shaped toy) into a small suitcase, simple background

pages.title: The Airport Ride
pages.story_text: In the car to the airport, Hero looks out the window. 'Airplanes, here we come!' says Dad.
pages.illustration_prompt: Hero sitting with Barvaz on their lap, beside a car window looking out at scenery

pages.title: Big Busy Airport
pages.story_text: The airport is full of lights, signs, and rolling suitcases. Hero holds Mom's hand tight.
pages.illustration_prompt: Hero holding Barvaz, standing next to rolling suitcases in a busy airport

pages.title: Looking Out the Window
pages.story_text: Hero spots airplanes waiting outside. 'They look like shiny birds!' Hero says. Barvaz peeks too.
pages.illustration_prompt: Hero and Barvaz looking through an airport window at airplanes on the tarmac

pages.title: Finding Our Seats
pages.story_text: Inside the airplane, Hero climbs into their seat. Barvaz gets a little spot too.
pages.illustration_prompt: Hero sitting in an airplane seat, buckled in, with Barvaz next to them

pages.title: The Loud Roar
pages.story_text: 'WHOOSH!' goes the airplane. Hero holds Mom's hand, Barvaz covers his ears. They all giggle.
pages.illustration_prompt: Hero with Barvaz on their lap, Barvaz's wings covering his ears, simple background

pages.title: Up in the Clouds
pages.story_text: Hero looks outsideâ€”fluffy clouds everywhere! 'It feels like we're flying in a dream,' Hero says.
pages.illustration_prompt: Hero with Barvaz by an airplane window, with soft cloud shapes visible outside

pages.title: Snack Time
pages.story_text: The flight attendant brings juice and crackers. Hero shares a tiny cracker with Barvaz.
pages.illustration_prompt: Hero with a cup and small crackers, sharing one with Barvaz

pages.title: New Place, New Fun
pages.story_text: The airplane lands safely. 'We did it!' says Mom. Hero, Dad, and Barvaz are ready to explore.
pages.illustration_prompt: Hero holding Barvaz, standing beside a suitcase, ready for new adventures
